EmailTemplate.name: Event - Tosca Technical Workshop - Infosys - Aug 2015.Email - Confirmation - Inf
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation for Tosca Testing Insights!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We are delighted that you have signed up for Tosca Testing Insights in Hyderabad on August 24th, 2015.
Please {{my.ical-infosys}} for the event.
In the event you will learn:
- How to achieve high sustainable automation rates without programming skills. - How to realize the highest business risk coverage with the smallest number of powerful test cases. - How to enable continuous delivery through continuous testing with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite.
After the presentations there will be time to discuss and network. Location:
Infosys, Hyderabad August 24th, 2015, 9:00 â€“ 12:00 p.m (IST) 50000X Hyderabad
We look forward to seeing you there!
Best Regards, Vaibhav Patil & Ingo Philipp
